welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Castelfranco di Sotto, a charming town known for its beautiful scenery and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the local culture and cuisine. Enjoy your stay in our lovely city!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
